Posts.Content: Jul 17, 2011 04:31PM Jen011 wrote: Junip   I dont know about the IBC but I get boils on my breast alot. I they do the purpish infected looking thing to. I had a mamogram and ultra sound done during an active boil and although it showed up in my case it B9..I do get them as I said alot and just had another Mamogram and ultra sound last Thursday will get the results on Tues. I worry about them as you do. I dont have any answers for you and I am sorry but I wanted to say we are kind of in the same boat. Hang in there Hon just like I am trying to do. I hope you get your answers soon........
Posts.Title: Recurrent boil on breast? Junip Jen011
